apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: A polished red apple. Looks delicious!

orange.name: Orange
orange.desc: An orange. The faint smell of citrus lingers in the air.

banana.name: Banana
banana.desc: A banana. Excellent source of potassium!

fruit_bowl.name: Fruit Bowl
fruit_bowl.desc: A bowl containing an apple, an orange, a banana, and a keycard.

storage_keycard_reader.name: Storage Keycard Reader
storage_keycard_reader.desc: It requires the Storage Keycard to unlock.

purple_box.name: Purple Box
purple_box.desc: A small purple box, it has a beautiful shine to it.

sandwich.name: Sandwich
sandwich.desc: A tuna salad sandwich with chopped pickles. It's probably Valencia's.

energy_bar.name: Snaxx Bar
energy_bar.desc:
A protein bar. The label reads:
"For the athlete inside your soul. Feel your olympic energy with Astrax' Snaxx Bar."

pda.name: PDA
pda.desc: Used to communicate with MAC-GFN and access ship controls.

valencia_locker.name: Locker 7
valencia_locker.desc:
A tag on the locker reads: "Valencia's Locker! Stay out!". It is covered in 
stickers of cute animals. 
A 4-digit keypad is attached to the front.

rec_locker.name: Locker 13
rec_locker.desc: A generic looking grey locker with a purple lock securing it.

purple_keycard_reader.name: Purple Lock
purple_keycard_reader.desc: A lock that has been poorly spraypainted purple with a "V" etched into the back. It looks like it takes a key.

purple_keycard.name: Purple Key
purple_keycard.desc: A metal key that has been poorly spraypainted purple. It looks like it is for a padlock somewhere.

lunch_bag.name: Lunch Bag
lunch_bag.desc: A dark blue lunch bag with polka dots on it. Stylish.

stack_of_magazines.name: Stack of Magazines
stack_of_magazines.desc: A bunch of magazines in a stack. Or is it a heap?\nEither way, there's a lot of magazines here, ranging from fashion magazines to home renovation catalogues.

valencia_laptop.name: Laptop
valencia_laptop.desc: A laptop. It is covered in stickers of cute animals.

portable_oxygen_tank.name: Portable Oxygen Tank
portable_oxygen_tank.desc: Useful for resupplying spacesuits and medical equipment.

oxygenator.name: Oxygenator
oxygenator.desc: A powerful Oxygen generator. Capable of servicing the oxygen needs for over three hundred people!

blue_keycard_reader.name: Blue Keycard Reader
blue_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a blue-coloured keycard.

blue_keycard.name: Blue Keycard
blue_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a blue-coloured reader.

black_keycard_reader.name: Black Keycard Reader
black_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a black-coloured keycard.

black_keycard.name: Black Keycard
black_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a black-coloured reader.

red_keycard_reader.name: Red Keycard Reader
red_keycard_reader.desc: The Red Keycard Reader is next to the door. The small display panel reads: 'Please insert your Red Keycard' in a large red font.

red_keycard.name: Red Keycard
red_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a red-coloured reader.

green_keycard_reader.name: Green Keycard Reader
green_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a green-coloured keycard.

green_keycard.name: Green Keycard
green_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a green-coloured reader.

admirals_log.name: Admiral's Log
admirals_log.desc: It is dated for three hours ago.

wrench.name: Wrench
wrench.desc: Standard-issue engineering wrench. Useful for tightening (or loosening) stubborn bolts.

magazine.name: Magazine
magazine.desc: A copy of Engineering Monthly, Issue #211. This month's articles include pointers on maintaining starliner engines, tips on how to impress non-Engineering colleagues without boring them, and 34 hacks on how to hack hack hackers hacking hackable hacksaws. Fascinating stuff.

hull_debris.name: Hull Debris
hull_debris.desc: A large chunk of the ship's hull. It probably shouldn't be there.

twisted_metal.name: Twisted Metal
twisted_metal.desc: A huge twisted steel girder. While the flames didn't melt it, it appears that non-uniform thermally-induced stress upon the girder created a concentrated axial compressive load causing sudden structural deformation resulting in a loss of structural stability in the whole room, or something. You're not an engineer.

melted_wiring.name: Melted Wiring
melted_wiring.desc: A bunch of plenum wiring that has melted and clumped together. Useless to all but the most desperate of scrapper.

molten_slag.name: Molten Slag
molten_slag.desc: Ouch! This stuff is still red hot!

macgfn_control_panel.name: MACGFN Control Panel
macgfn_control_panel.desc: This panel controls all of MAC-GFN's primary functionality. It has an insert slot for an AI Matrix.
